summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, altering and establishing of First Avenue North, from Smith Street to Ray Street; and of Ray Street, from First Avenue North to Second Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
